author: Zachary Warmbrodt
title: Pence presses governors to ramp up testing
description: The vice president said he believed it was possible to double coronavirus testing capacity with assistance from the nation’s governors.
content:
Vice President Mike Pence. | Alex Wong/Getty Images
Vice President Mike Pence on Sunday said he believed it was possible to double coronavirus testing capacity with assistance from the nation's governors who continue to claim they don't have what they need t… [+673 chars]
